attributes.action: Stiop Labour introducing £1600 per month for asylum seekers in Wales.
attributes.additional_details:
In the present economic climate people are struggling across the Country plus many working people do not earn this amount anyway and many Old Age Pensioners live on less paying all their working lives for the priviladge.

Paying this money to asylum seekers will just encourage more to come and, if successful in their claim, their families also.
attributes.background:
Labour have proposed to pay asylum seekers in Wales £1600 per month no doubt on top of free accomodation and other benifits - this must be stopped.

It has also been suggested that, if their claims fail, they will get Legal Aid in order to fight the decision.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the Welsh Government and not the responsibility of the UK Government.

The Welsh Parliament have their own petitions process for matters they are responsible for. You can view existing petitions, or start a new one on their website below:

https://petitions.senedd.wales/
